name: Potent Healing Potion
description: This delicious potion will heal you significantly.

name: Lesser Healing Potion
description: This delicious potion will heal you slightly.

name: Potion of Strength
description: This delicious potion will increase your strength by 2 for 5 rounds.

name: Potion of Dexterity
description: This delicious potion will increase your dexterity by 2 for 5 rounds.

name: Infinity Ring of Power
description: Allows you to add +50 to your strength

name: Infinity Ring of Mind
description: Allows you to add +50 to your intelligence

name: Infinity Ring of Reality
description: Allows you to trap up to 10 opponents in a powerful illusion of your choice. Wears off after a full day. Can only be used once per day.

name: Infinity Ring of Soul
description: Allows you to be resurrected if health drops below 0. You wake up with full health. Can only be used once per day.

name: Infinity Ring of Space
description: Allows you to teleport 50 squares away. Can only be used once per day.

name: Infinity Ring of Time
description: Allows you five extra actions during your turn. Can only be used once per day.

name: Celestial Heavy Armor
description: This armor provides great protection against physical and magic attacks.

name: Celestial Medium Armor
description: This armor provides protection against physical and magic attacks.

name: Celestial Light Armor
description: This armor provides slight protection against physical and magic attacks.

name: Heavy Robes
description: This armor provides great protection against magic attacks.

name: Medium Robes
description: This armor provides protection against magic attacks.

name: Light Robes
description: This armor provides slight protection against magic attacks.

name: Heavy Armor
description: This armor provides great protection against physical attacks.

name: Medium Armor
description: This armor provides protection against physical attacks.

name: Light Armor
description: This armor provides slight protection against physical attacks.

name: Simple Clothes
description: Your average fantasy attire.

name: Prismatic Wand
description: This weapon was forged from rare ore in the heart of a volcano.

name: Ancient Wand
description: This weapon was crafted by a skilled wizard.

name: Simple Wand
description: Your average fantasy magic weapon.

name: Prismatic Bow
description: This weapon was forged from rare ore in the heart of a volcano.

name: Crafted Bow
description: This weapon was crafted by a skilled bowyer.

name: Bent Bow
description: Your average fantasy ranged weapon.

name: Prismatic Sword
description: This weapon was forged from rare ore in the heart of a volcano.

name: Sharpened Sword
description: This weapon was crafted by a skilled blacksmith.

name: Rusted Sword
description: Your average fantasy melee weapon.

name: Potion of Intelligence
description: This delicious potion will increase your intelligence by 2 for 5 rounds.

name: Potion of Wisdom
description: This delicious potion will increase your wisdom by 2 for 5 rounds.
